bio: I am the creator of Optiland Quests - a series of weekly learn and earn quest featuring different dapp within the Optimism ecosystem.
contributionDescription:
Learning about different protocols that exist in the Optimism ecosystem is the first step toward discovery and onboarding users to those protocols. The team made the following contributions to help the adoption of the Optimism ecosystem:

16 weekly Learn to Earn Quests: 
Encouraged program participants to learn a different protocol every week in the broader OP ecosystem.  Successful participants received $OP for their participation.

Coinbase Wallet App Quest:
Produced a commemorative work of art that was featured as part of the Coinbase Wallet App Quests.  Participants earned some $OP for bridging some $ETH to Optimism and minting the artwork.

impactDescription:
Learn to Earn Quests:  Participants learned about different protocols in the broader Optimism ecosystem.  Learning about different dApps is the first step toward using the dApp and wider adoption of the Optimism ecosystem.

Impact Metrics:

On chain:
2628 submissions
2090 payouts
17500 $OP sent through QuestN

Offchain: 
72K direct views, over 100K impressions since June 

Projects featured in the quest benefited from additional exposure.  List of projects benefited in the link.

Coinbase Wallet App Quests:

On chain:
24,000 people have minted Lady Greatness: Fall of Sybils on Optimism

Offchain:
Over 150k impressions on X through all the tweets about the quests

Helped onboard 25,000 Coinbase Wallet users onto Optimism, creating a positive impact on the entire Optimism system.

fundingSources.description: 20000 $OP grant given by OP foundation to be given entirely to users
